ing: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
n: Cucumber, Mango, and Black Bean Salad
des: "This is an easy and delicious salad. Perfect for a cookout."
ins: Place black beans, cumin, and water in a microwave-safe bowl; heat in microwave on high for 1 minute. Mix mango, cucumber, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, lime juice, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl; stir in black beans. Serve immediately or chill in refrigerator before serving.
